QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT distinct prov_facility_npi npi, coalesce(patient_state, '') + '_' + cast(patient_zip3 as varchar) location_source_value FROM {sc}.medical_claims where prov_facility_npi is not null and prov_facility_npi != '' and prov_facility_npi != 'null' union SELECT distinct pharmacy_npi npi, coalesce(patient_state, '') + '_' + cast(patient_zip3 as varchar) location_source_value FROM {sc}.pharmacy_claims where pharmacy_npi is not null and pharmacy_npi != '' and pharmacy_npi != 'null' union SELECT distinct lab_npi npi, coalesce(patient_state, '') + '_' + cast(patient_zip3 as varchar) location_source_value FROM {sc}.lab where lab_npi is not null and lab_npi != '' and lab_npi != 'null'
